name: rhizal
description: A lightweight chatbot for the Signal platform.

scripts.build: babel src --out-dir dist && cp -r src/initialization dist/initialization && cp -r scripts_config dist/scripts_config
scripts.wipe-db: docker compose run --rm rhizal node src/wipe.js
scripts.rhizal-init: docker compose run --rm rhizal node src/init.js
scripts.script-sync: docker compose -f docker-compose-no-signal.yml run --rm rhizal node src/script_sync.js
scripts.signal-config: docker compose run --rm rhizal node src/signal_config.js

author: David Jay
